resources.string: Verification complete!\nCheck back later for more
No network connection! Restore connection to view deterred animals.

Swipe the cards you see or use the buttons below to accept or deny the deterrence attempts to verify the accuracy of the machine learning. If you make a mistake, you may use the button in the center to undo a decision. The decisions will be committed once the screen is changed or app is closed.

This screen presents a list of all past accepted deterrences, in chronological order with the newest added instances at the top of the list. The list is automatically updated after instances have been verified on the Verify Screen
Click on the button(s) with the icon corresponding to the animal(s) you would like to deter with WDS.
